item.title: Olive Leaf Band Ring

item.description: With beautifully sculpted leaves in 18k gold, Paloma honors the olive branch, a symbol of peace and abundance.

item.title: Nesting Narrow Band Ring
item.dc:creator: duong
item.description: Featuring v-shaped details, the nesting band ring is the perfect complement to all Tiffany engagement ring styles.

item.title: Makers Slice Ring
item.dc:creator: duong
item.description: Intricately designed in 18k gold, this contemporary ring design features a flat top perfect for engraving.

Crafted with a makers symbol inspired by the renowned Tiffany hollowware shop, the Tiffany 1837® Makers collection honors Tiffany’s legacy of expert craftsmanship through a modern lens. This ring looks sleek whether worn alone or with other Tiffany jewelry.

item.title: Diamond Vine Ring In Platinum
item.dc:creator: duong
item.description: With an intensity that rivals the night sky, Tiffany Victoria celebrates the blazing brilliance of Tiffany diamonds.
